title: Fantasy LCS
body: Hello i was wondering if anyone would like to join my fantasy LCS league There are 5 more slots avalible so please come join. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} Also add me on league when you join so i can msg you if anything happens.

replies.body:
Hey Johnny, 

Just saying something like this should be put under the team recruitment tab so when people are searching for Team 5v5s, they'll find your discussion under the necessary category.

~Moo
